verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:9
verses.text: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them: for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation of them that hate me,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:10
verses.text: And shewing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:11
verses.text: Thou shalt not take the name of the Lord thy God in vain: for the Lord will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 5:12
verses.text: Keep the sabbath day to sanctify it, as the Lord thy God hath commanded thee.
